title: Instagram : most-followed FMCG brands 2017
yAxis: Number of Instagram followers in millions
summary: According to the most recent data gathered in , the movie with the Instagram most-followed weekend at the Instagram Number is Marvel creation ‘ Monster_Energy : Too_Faced_Cosmetics ' _ , which grossed a record breaking 9.6 millions on its first weekend of screening .
‘ Too_Faced_Cosmetics ' was not the only movie from The Monster_Energy series to perform impressively at the Number Instagram on its most-followed weekend .
‘ Monster_Energy : Urban_Decay ' ranked second , though its followers was almost one hundred millions lower , emphasizing how successful ‘ Too_Faced_Cosmetics ' really was .
gold: This statistic presents a ranking of leading FMCG brands on Instagram as of December 2017 , based on the number of followers . As of the survey period , Red Bull ranked third with 8 million followers . Too Faced Cosmetics was ranked first with 9.6 million followers .
